experiences.description: Led the end-to-end redesign and redevelopment of a Web Shell App, a critical interface for collaboration partners to test BCA's API products (OneKlik, Sakuku, Magna Carta, etc) for a 6-month period.
Collaborated with the product team to design intuitive user interfaces and experiences, increasing user engagement by 20%.
Guided 58 computer science students in essential web development languages: HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Provided a solid foundation in AngularJS as the primary web development framework.

Instructed 125 students in UI/UX design through across diverse faculties through drag-and-drop website editing. Successfully Demonstrated digital transformation in various industries through student projects involved direct interaction with SMEs.
Instructed 20+ computer science students on how to operate Oracle Database using Linux operated via VirtualBox and implemented an Oracle SQL queries through command line using Linux.
